h1: Calories in 8 oz NY Strip Steak
assumptions: USDA Choice grade, broiled, trimmed of excess fat, no added oils, marinades, or seasonings.

quick_answer.text: An 8 oz NY strip steak provides ~568 kcal and ~57 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.
